ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Message boards?
ygData.msgSnippet: maybe i m just rich then, i never use anything but rune 5 now, and i pretty much don t carry any less than 60-80 periodots. and other than runeV what else
ygData.messageBody:
maybe i'm just rich then, i never use anything but rune 5 now, and i
pretty much don't carry any less than 60-80 periodots.
and other than runeV what else whould you want on your robe? cause that
Reclaim magic on the shoes is the biggest joke i think i've ever seen. i
just can't think of anything better than a rune spell to put on the robe.

I just know that i'm glad at least rune4 is on there cause doing these
like VS and Trak where eveyone wants rune that will be helpful (their
dots/life taps eat the rune first)... hehe in fact during Trak usually have
a golem charmed and keep myself alive with rune... hehe

As for Naggy and Vox... you get to fight over who tashes, and then after
that all you can really do is mana seive (only takes 2 chanters to take all
his/her mana)

Personally if i could change anything about enchanters.. i'd give us
something that wasn't magic based ... like make our dots disease based or
give a poison DD or something other than magic. cause when that chanter
BotB comes around it's gonna be a joke to watch.
